full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DMIGS BRTZE MA DRAG PO'I GSUM 'BREL GYI SGO NAS RANG GZHAN GYI DON DU BYABS KHRUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES BUM MCHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS A'I DUS 'DIR RGYAL PO DANG BTZAN SOGS PA SDE BRGYAD RANG SRONG 'BYUNG PO RNAMS KYIS 'TSE 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MCHOD DPON SHES RAB PO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ` DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MIN CAN GYIS LCAGS KHYI DBYAR ZLA: @010B THA MA'I TSES BCU BDUN LA TSE TSEG THUNVA GVAZHES PA'I SA CHAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DZA YANTU MANGGA LA, ,)
author_simple: DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN,
